items.value:
Shield
Past students of the school who tried to escape from Baldi have created a shield to protect themselves, but since it's used, it will only protect for 20 seconds

Calculator
This device was stolen from school faculty for those who don't have time to solve problems! Very powerful and helps well in <color=red>hard</color> situations!

Potion of speed
Do you like to run, but don't like detention? Just drink this potion and you will become the fastest by almost half a minute!

Gravity Device
Is the shield too expensive for you? There is an alternative! Through joint development with a mysterious person, you can change gravity yourself!
(due to a weak battery, its action is limited to 15 seconds)

Glue
This is Johnny's own glue, if you pour it out, then everyone will have to go around it so as not to get stuck

Elevator deactivator
Close the elevator closest to you at any time! But keep in mind that Baldi will hear it and come to the sound
